name: Ravenfall
description:
"Two misterious mercenaries are hired by the Lady of Jokulsmaer to deliver a secret letter to Jarl Kjötve, a viking warlord leading an invading army at the lands of Eireann.  While it initially seems a rather easy task, things got into a dark twist after they are confronted by the ambitions of a local lord and their own pasts."

CHARACTERS: 

Valravn: The main character. A mysterious young norseman from Ulvengard, silent and apathic. His magic songs affect the overall perception of an ambient. 

Represents schizoid personalities.

Askeladd: Valravn's mentor and caretaker. An old norsemen struggling to leave his past behind and find his own self, regardless of the obstacles.

Represents obsessive-compulsive personalities.

Mórrigan: The last of the People of Danu. Deeply affected by the loss of her beloved sisters, Mórrigan uses her magic to mimicry and impersonate them. 

Represents dissociative personalities.

CONTROLS:

Arrows: Move the Player

A: Use Main Weapon

D: Use Shield/Side Weapon

Q/W/E/R: Use Skills

F/H: Use Consumables

X: Open Menu

Esc: Cancel

Enter: Interaction

Shift: Run
